items.sentence: I\'m impressed with how well you speak French.
I\'m looking for Tom. Do you know where he is?
I\'m not going to eat the rest of my sandwich.
Tom is about three years younger than Mary is.
Tom is always asking me to get things for him.
Tom is an old friend of mine from high school.
Tom is better at French than he is at English.
Tom put his briefcase on the seat next to him.
Tom put the box on the floor next to his desk.
Tom put the butter back into the refrigerator.
Tom put the lid back on the peanut butter jar.
Tom put the presents under the Christmas tree.
I wish I could spend more time with my family.
I pulled the car over to the side of the road.
I remember the way you used to flirt with Tom.
I sensed immediately that something was wrong.
I think it\'s time for me to organize a party.
I think it\'s time for me to return to Boston.
I\'ll do my homework after I watch television.
I\'ll email you all the pictures I took today.
I\'ll have it finished by the end of the week.
I\'ll make a sandwich for you if you want one.
It\'s a small school. Everyone knows everyone.
It\'s about ten minutes to the station by bus.
It\'s about thirty miles from here on Route 3.
It\'s about time you sent the children to bed.
It\'s been a pleasure doing business with you.
Tom majored in Japanese literature in college.
Tom manages to get along on very little money.
Tom may not be as good at French as you think.
Tom meant it as a joke, but no one was amused.
Tom mentioned that it was about time to leave.
Tom must be very happy after winning the race.
Do you think they\'ll know we\'re from Boston?
I saw something on the other side of the room.
I should tell Tom what you and I did together.
I parked on the street in front of your house.
I asked Tom not to wear his sister\'s clothes.
If you find a mistake, please leave a comment.
If you should meet a bear, pretend to be dead.
If you want to speak to me, please call me up.
I will write letters to you as often as I can.
I wish that we could spend more time together.
I wonder how long this cold weather will last.
I wonder what inspired Tom to write that song?
I wonder why my name is no longer on the list.
In basketball, tall players have an advantage.
In those days, few people could travel abroad.
I think it\'s time for me to lose some weight.
I think reading novels isn\'t a waste of time.
